translation.en: Vision, normal.
Hearing, normal.
Smell… [sniffs]
…normal.
Pain perception, normal.
Blood glucose, electrolytes, enzymes, all abnormally normal.
Just what you'd expect from a brand-new body.
translation.es: Justo lo que se esperade un cuerpo recién estrenado.

translation.en: Emotional responses and stress tolerance, normal.
translation.es: Respuestas emocionalesy tolerancia al estrés: normales.

translation.en: Memories, clear.
I am human.
Morning, Nina.
Hi, Mack. Would you please come to the medical room?
translation.es: Hola, Mack.¿Podrías venir a la enfermería?

translation.en: For the physical?
Just give me a moment to take all this in.
translation.es: Dame un momento para apreciar esto.

translation.en: I was just born into this world, you know.
translation.es: Acabo de nacer en este mundo.

translation.en: The printing is accurate, right down to the patterns in the iris.
translation.es: La impresión es muy precisa,hasta en los patrones del iris.

translation.en: Even twins don't match that well.
translation.es: Ni los gemelos son tan idénticos.

translation.en: Mmm. My taste buds seem to be working fine too.
translation.es: También me funciona bien el gusto.

translation.en: Although this stuff may not look all that appetizing, it's not bad.
translation.es: Aunque no se ve muy apetitosa,no tiene mal sabor.

translation.en: When I eat it, I can tell that it tastes good.
translation.es: Cuando la como,me doy cuenta de que sabe bien.

translation.en: We're instinctively comparing it to food we ate in the past.
translation.es: La comparamos instintivamentecon la que comimos antes.

translation.en: What about your memories? How's the connection?
When I was getting backed up, I lay down on the bed and closed my eyes.
translation.es: Mientras se descargaba mi conciencia,me acosté y cerré los ojos.

translation.en: And then when I opened them again, I was on the other side of space.
translation.es: Y cuando volví a abrirlos,estaba al otro lado del espacio.

translation.en: It's kind of a shock. [Mack] Same here.
translation.es: - Fue impresionante.- Me sucedió lo mismo.

translation.en: I have the illusion of my consciousness just continuing right from that day.
translation.es: Mi conciencia parece continuardirectamente desde ese día.

translation.en: But the physical person I am now, it's--
translation.es: Pero la persona que soy ahora físicamente

translation.en: It's not the person who got their memory backed up.
translation.es: no es la misma personaque hizo una copia de su memoria.

translation.en: Oscar's finished printing.
Amazing.
The cavity's gone. This new body's fantastic.
translation.es: Ya no tengo caries.Este cuerpo nuevo es fantástico.

translation.en: Yes!
Hey, I think it's about time we got to work.
translation.es: Oye, ya es horade que nos pongamos a trabajar.

translation.en: We can, after everybody's printed.
[Mack] We need to get going before the migrant vessel gets here.
translation.es: Apurémonos antes de que llegueel barco de migrantes.

translation.en: [chuckles] Bullshit.
The migrants won't arrive for another hundred years.
translation.es: Los migrantes llegarándentro de cien años.

translation.en: Living beings can't make it through subspace, even in cryosleep.
translation.es: Los seres vivos no sobrevivenal subespacio, ni siquiera en criosueño.

translation.en: They can't warp here.
Damn it.
-[Mack] Hello, Patty. -[Oscar] Hey, Patty.
Good morning, everyone.
[Mack] While we're waiting for Lewis, let's talk.
We're almost at our destination of Planet X-10.
translation.es: Estamos cerca de nuestro destino,el planeta X-10.

translation.en: We've already entered its star system.
translation.es: Ya entramos en su sistema estelar.

translation.en: How many days has it been since we left Earth?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuántos días salimos de la Tierra?

translation.en: It's been what, a week?
But of course, that's in days based on the rotation of the Earth.
translation.es: Si nos basamosen la rotación de la Tierra.

translation.en: So where are our original selves now?
We can't track them in real time.
translation.es: No podemos localizarlos en tiempo real.

translation.en: But if we were to make a rough estimate…
the migrant vessel should be around here.
translation.es: el barco de migrantes debería estar aquí.

translation.en: It's a long trip, so everyone's in cryosleep to keep from aging.
translation.es: Es un viaje largo.Van criogenizados para no envejecer.

translation.en: Our original selves are dreaming away.
It must be strange for them too.
translation.es: Para ellos también debe ser extraño.

translation.en: Another version of their self has been created
translation.es: Se creó otra versión de ellos mismos

translation.en: on the other side of space and is working while they're asleep.
translation.es: al otro lado del espacio,que está activa mientras duermen.

translation.en: We were chosen and given special permission to be printed by The Womb.
translation.es: Nos eligieron y nos dieron permisopara que la Matriz nos imprimiera.

translation.en: It's an honor.
We were selected because we were the most qualified.
translation.es: Nos eligieron por ser los más aptos.

translation.en: So we have to make Planet X-10 a comfortable place to live
translation.es: Debemos hacer del planeta X-10un lugar cómodo donde vivir

translation.en: before they arrive.
-[alert blaring] -What's happening?
Shit! It's an electromagnetic wave. And it's damn strong.
translation.es: ¡Carajo! Es una onda electromagnética.Y es muy potente.

translation.en: It can't be.
It's a flare.
[sighs] Had me going for a second.
No reports of fire.
But there are some areas I can't confirm.
translation.es: Pero no puedo chequear algunas áreas.

translation.en: Looks like some of the electronic equipment isn't responding.
translation.es: Parece que parte del equipo electrónicono responde.

translation.en: All right, let's split up and inspect for damage.
translation.es: Separémonos y veamos si hubo daños.

translation.en: -Got it? -[all] Got it.
[Patty] Good it didn't happen while you were out there.
translation.es: Menos mal que no pasómientras trabajabas fuera.

translation.en: Could have been exposed to radiation.
Luck was on my side.
I want to know why nobody told us that this sun sneezes.
translation.es: ¿Por qué nadie nos dijoque el sol estornuda?

translation.en: [Patty] Yeah, that was a little too close for comfort, if you ask me.
translation.es: Sí, estuvo demasiado cerca, en mi opinión.

translation.en: It's just a little bit of bad luck.
translation.es: Solo fue un poco de mala suerte.

translation.en: Wow. It's huge.
[Patty] What is it, Mack?
[Mack] The atmospheric transformer.
[chuckles] It'd better be big.
That thing is gonna give the entire planet a makeover.
translation.es: Esa cosa transformará al planetapor completo.

translation.en: [Mack] Yeah.
Technically, the plants will do most of the work.
translation.es: Técnicamente, las plantasharán casi todo el trabajo.

translation.en: But we need the reactor to stabilize the atmosphere first.
translation.es: Pero necesitamos que el reactorestabilice la atmósfera primero.

translation.en: Can anyone tell what's going on with the printing room?
translation.es: ¿Saben qué sucede en la sala de impresión?

translation.en: The Womb should've finished printing Lewis by now, but he hasn't come out.
translation.es: La Matriz ya debería haber impresoa Lewis, pero aún no ha salido.

translation.en: [Oscar] Hold on. The Womb is currently in operation.
translation.es: Momento. La Matriz está activa ahora.

translation.en: That's odd.
There's an error message.
[Nina] I'd like to take a look inside,
but entry during printing is a violation of privacy.
translation.es: pero violaría la privacidadsi entrara durante la impresión.

translation.en: Is everyone okay with me going in?
-[Oscar] Of course. -[Mack] Permission granted.
[Patty] I agree as well.
What is this?
What's wrong?
-[Nina panting] It's Lewis, he… -[Mack] Nina?
translation.es: - Algo le pasó a Lewis. Está…- ¿Nina?

translation.en: [Nina] Get over here! Come quickly!
[Patty gasps] Oh, my God!
Thank you.
Feeling better?
[sighs] I guess so.
The DNA analysis shows this is definitely Lewis.
translation.es: El análisis de ADN indicaque ese sí es Lewis.

translation.en: But it is clearly not. Just look at him.
translation.es: Pero está claro que no lo es.Basta con mirarlo.

translation.en: There has to have been an error during the printing.
translation.es: Seguro fue un error en la impresión.

translation.en: It must have been from the flare.
Maybe it caused a surge in The Womb that led to a malfunction.
translation.es: Quizá causó una sobrecarga en la Matrizy la hizo fallar.

translation.en: [Mack] So, is he alive?
The heart is beating.
[Mack] Any brain activity? Yes, but only weak activity.
translation.es: - ¿Hay actividad cerebral?- Sí, pero es muy débil.

translation.en: It's a state known as an alpha coma.
translation.es: A ese estado se lo llama coma alfa.

translation.en: [Mack] Have there been other cases of The Womb failing during a printing?
translation.es: ¿Hubo otros casos de errores en la Matrizdurante una impresión?

translation.en: [Nina] None that have been made public.
translation.es: No se ha hecho público ninguno.

translation.en: There may have been during the development phase.
translation.es: Quizá los hubo en la fase de desarrollo.

translation.en: Remember, it wasn't made by human hands.
translation.es: No olviden que no fue creada por humanos.

translation.en: [Mack] When dealing with printing errors,
translation.es: Si hay un error de impresión,

translation.en: those who are at the scene decide what course of action to take, correct?
Yes, that's right.
[Mack] We should reprint a proper Lewis.
translation.es: Imprimamos un nuevo Lewis sin errores.

translation.en: It's for the good of the mission. We should dispose of this one.
translation.es: Es por el bien de la misión.Hay que deshacerse de este Lewis.

translation.en: But that would be murder, wouldn't it?
Do we have the right to take his life just because he lacks consciousness?
translation.es: ¿Tenemos derecho a quitarle la vidasolo porque no tiene conciencia?

translation.en: He's still a living being.
Patty, we need material that contains Lewis's genetic information in order to reprint him.
translation.es: Patty, necesitamos material genéticode Lewis para reimprimirlo.

translation.en: The quickest way to do that is to disassemble this one
translation.es: La forma más rápida de obtenerloes desarmar a este Lewis

translation.en: and use it as biomaterial.
And it can't be from just anyone.
translation.es: Y no puede ser de otra persona.

translation.en: To create Lewis, we need Lewis's biomaterial.
translation.es: Para crear a Lewis,necesitamos su biomaterial.

translation.en: We can make more by cultivating. The bodies that we have now were made
translation.es: Podemos cultivar más.Nuestros cuerpos actuales se hicieron

translation.en: by growing material from harvested cells, right?
I did go ahead and start the cell cultivation, just in case.
translation.es: Ya comencé el cultivo celularpor si acaso.

translation.en: But it's going to take a while.
[Mack] If we wait, our schedule will be delayed.
Lewis is responsible for the atmospheric transformer.
We should destroy this one and print a new, proper Lewis immediately.
translation.es: Hay que destruir a este Lewisy reimprimir uno sin errores de inmediato.

translation.en: Look, I agree with Mack.
If I were in that state, I wouldn't want to be kept alive.
translation.es: Si yo estuviera así,no querría seguir vivo.

translation.en: You're just trying to detract from the fact that it's murder.
translation.es: Quieres restarle importancia al hechode que es un asesinato.

translation.en: That is not a person. It's just a lump of flesh.
translation.es: Eso no es una persona.No es más que carne y huesos.

translation.en: [sighs] Patty…
According to the rules set forth by the Planetary Development Agency,
translation.es: Según las normas establecidaspor la Agencia de Desarrollo Planetario,

translation.en: major decisions require unanimous consent.
If you aren't in agreement, we can't euthanize him.
translation.es: Si no estás de acuerdo,no podemos aplicar la eutanasia.

translation.en: We can put it in the record that you initially objected,
translation.es: Podemos poner en el registroque inicialmente te opusiste,

translation.en: so it won't be on your conscience.
translation.es: para que no te pese en la conciencia.

translation.en: [Oscar] We respect your principles, Patty, we do.
And all life should be protected, without exception.
translation.es: Y todas las vidas deben protegerse,sin excepción.

translation.en: But we're in a special situation.
That's not it at all.
[Nina] I can take care of the procedure.
He'll just go into a deep sleep, without ever knowing he was even born.
translation.es: Entrará en un sueño profundoy ni siquiera sabrá que ha nacido.

translation.en: Okay, if there's no other choice.
translation.es: Si no queda otra opción, estoy de acuerdo.

translation.en: It just doesn't seem right to let a soul be destroyed.
translation.es: Pero no me parece bienque destruyan un alma.

translation.en: [Oscar] A soul, huh?
Do we even have souls?
Beats me.
Seriously, though, are all botanists like her?
translation.es: Hablando en serio,¿todos los botánicos son así?

translation.en: [Oscar] I think she might be especially compassionate. She says she can even talk to cats and dogs.
translation.es: Creo que es particularmente empática.Dice que puede hablar con los animales.

translation.en: Well, having a botanist is essential for this mission.
translation.es: Bueno, es esencial tener un botánicoen nuestra misión.

translation.en: If there aren't plants rooted into the surface of Planet X-10,
translation.es: Si no hay plantasen la superficie del planeta X-10,

translation.en: there'll be no stable supply of oxygen.
translation.es: no habrá un flujo estable de oxígeno.

translation.en: Yeah, sure, but… [scoffs] …this isn't normal.
translation.es: Sí, pero esto no es normal.

translation.en: I'm not talking about her. I mean all of us.
translation.es: No hablo de ella.Me refiero a todos nosotros.

translation.en: We asked her to agree to kill one of our own.
translation.es: Le pedimos que aceptara matara uno de los nuestros.

translation.en: That's not on us.
Blame whoever thought of printing human beings in the first place.
translation.es: La culpa es de quien tuvo la ideade imprimir seres humanos.

translation.en: You know living things can't travel through subspace.
translation.es: Sabes que los seres vivosno sobreviven en el subespacio.

translation.en: This was our only choice.
Hi, Nina. How are you feeling?
Have you seen Planet X-10 yet?
I am the original version of you. I recorded this right before leaving Earth.
translation.es: Soy la versión original de ti.Grabé esto antes de dejar la Tierra.

translation.en: I left a present for you. I hope you found it.
translation.es: Te dejé un regalo.Espero que lo hayas encontrado.

translation.en: If you, the printed version of me,
properly share the same consciousness and memories of the past, then you should know what it is.
translation.es: tienes mi misma concienciay mis recuerdos, sabrás lo que es.

translation.en: It's the cat doll from our childhood. [chuckles]
It's always been by my side, watching over me, and-- and now I'm giving it to you.
translation.es: Siempre me ha acompañado y protegido,y ahora te lo doy a ti.

translation.en: [chuckles] She's thinking of me
so that, as a printed copy, I don't forget that I'm human.
translation.es: para que, como copia impresa,no me olvide de que soy humana.

translation.en: [on screen] So, I guess I'll see you in a hundred years.
translation.es: Bueno, nos vemos en cien años.

translation.en: By that time, a green paradise will have spread out over the surface of Planet X-10.
translation.es: Para entonces, un paraíso vegetalse habrá extendido en el planeta X-10.

translation.en: This smell really takes me back to Earth.
translation.es: Este olor me recuerda mucho a la Tierra.

translation.en: The wind, the sun…
[chuckles] …the swing that was in my backyard.
translation.es: el columpio que tenía en el patio.

translation.en: [Mack] It's going to take three syringes?
The first is a sedative, the next is a muscle relaxant,
translation.es: La primera es un sedante,la segunda, un relajante muscular,

translation.en: and the last one stops the heart from beating.
translation.es: y la tercera le detendrá el corazón.

translation.en: A sedative? [Nina] It's the most humane process.
translation.es: - ¿Un sedante?- Es la forma menos cruel de hacerlo.

translation.en: Is Patty there with you?
No. She's in the Greenhouse.
[Oscar] She doesn't wanna see this.
[Nina] Okay, I guess I should get started.
translation.es: Bien, creo que es hora de empezar.

translation.en: [Mack] Please.
You shouldn't feel a thing.
You'll just start sleeping a little deeper than you are now.
translation.es: Entrarás en un sueño aún más profundo.

translation.en: You're going to be reborn.
Your being here was a mistake.
Wait. What?
Never mind. Must be imagining things.
Good night.
Sleep peacefully.
-Nina! -Damn it!
[Oscar] Patty! Patty! C-Can you hear me?
Oscar, what's wrong?
[Oscar] Stay where you are.
translation.es: No te muevas de donde estás.

translation.en: Why? What's happening?
[Oscar] It's-- It's Lewis. He got up, and--
-[alert blaring] -[automated voice] Fire! Fire!
All crew members, please evacuate immediately.
-[Mack, Oscar shuddering] -Fire! Fire! Fire! Fire!
Oscar, help Nina. [panting]
[automated voice] Fire! Fire!
-All crew members, please evacuate… -Can anyone hear me?
-This is Patty. Please respond. What ha-- -[objects crash]
[gasps] Lewis?
Patty! Run!
Nina! Are you all right? Nina.
Oh, no. Oh, no.
[Mack] Lewis?
Lewis! [grunts]
I-- I feel like we should say something.
translation.es: Creo que deberíamos decir unas palabras.

translation.en: You go ahead. I don't have any words.
translation.es: Adelante. Yo me quedé sin palabras.

translation.en: Goodbye, Nina.
I-- I'm sorry.
Now it's more like "The Tomb" than The Womb.
translation.es: Más que una matriz, ahora es una cripta.

translation.en: Those words are more connected than you might think.
translation.es: Esas palabras están más conectadasde lo que crees.

translation.en: They say, long ago, that people built graves and temples
translation.es: Dicen que hace mucho tiempose construían tumbas y templos

translation.en: as wombs for the dead to be reborn in.
translation.es: para que los muertos renacieranen esos sitios.

translation.en: Don't tell me you're gonna use that for self-defense.
translation.es: No me digas que usarás esopara defenderte.

translation.en: No, for hunting.
You know the printer won't let us make weapons.
translation.es: Sabes que la impresorano nos deja crear armas.

translation.en: This is as good as it gets. It's too dangerous to leave out there.
translation.es: Es lo mejor que conseguí.Es muy peligroso dejarlo ahí fuera.

translation.en: [Oscar] The reprint is starting. We'll see Nina in half an hour.
translation.es: Comenzó la reimpresión.Estaremos con Nina en media hora.

translation.en: [Nina] Vision, normal.
Hearing, normal.
Smell… [sniffs]
…normal.
Pain perception, normal.
Memories, clear.
I am human.
